Direct Translation: Great is the name of the Lord, Emmanuel,
Poetic Translation: Worthy is the name of our Emmanuel,
Who to us was heralded by Gabriel.

Direct Translation: Today he has appeared; he has appeared in Israel
Poetic Translation: And today he has appeared, he has appeared in Israel,

Direct Translation: By the Virgin Mary in Bethlehem.
Poetic Translation: Of the Virgin Mary born in Bethlehem.
